title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-featured online store with cart, payments, and admin dashboard. Built with React, Node.js, and Stripe integration.

title: Social Media Dashboard
description: Analytics dashboard for tracking social media metrics across multiple platforms with real-time updates.

title: AI Chat Application
description: Conversational AI interface powered by GPT with context memory and custom personality configurations.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: Mobile-first fitness app with workout logging, progress charts, and social challenges.

title: Real Estate Platform
description: Property listing platform with 3D virtual tours, mortgage calculator, and agent matching.

title: Music Streaming Service
description: Spotify-like music platform with playlist creation, recommendations, and social sharing.

title: Task Management Tool
description: Kanban-style project management with team collaboration, time tracking, and automation.

title: Weather Application
description: Beautiful weather app with 7-day forecasts, radar maps, and severe weather alerts.

title: Crypto Portfolio Tracker
description: Cryptocurrency portfolio manager with real-time prices, alerts, and tax reporting.

title: Recipe Sharing Platform
description: Community recipe platform with meal planning, grocery lists, and nutritional info.

title: Image Recognition API
description: Machine learning API for image classification, object detection, and facial recognition.

title: Video Conferencing App
description: WebRTC-based video calling with screen sharing, recording, and virtual backgrounds.

title: Learning Management System
description: Educational platform with courses, quizzes, certificates, and progress tracking.

title: Inventory Management
description: Warehouse management system with barcode scanning, stock alerts, and supplier integration.

title: Dating App UI
description: Modern dating app interface with swipe mechanics, matching algorithm, and chat.

title: NFT Marketplace
description: Blockchain-based marketplace for creating, buying, and selling digital collectibles.

title: Code Editor
description: Browser-based code editor with syntax highlighting, auto-complete, and live preview.

title: Booking System
description: Appointment scheduling system for salons, clinics, and service businesses.

title: News Aggregator
description: Personalized news feed with AI-powered recommendations and reading time estimates.

title: Smart Home Controller
description: IoT dashboard for controlling smart home devices with automation and energy tracking.

title: Travel Planning App
description: Trip planner with itinerary builder, budget tracker, and local recommendations.

title: Document Scanner
description: Mobile document scanner with OCR, PDF export, and cloud storage integration.

title: Restaurant POS
description: Point of sale system for restaurants with table management and order tracking.

title: Podcast Platform
description: Podcast hosting and streaming platform with analytics and monetization tools.
